required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparative Study of Real-time Ultrasound-CT Fusion Imaging and Ultrasound-guided Selective Lumbar Nerve Root Block
clinical_study.official_title: Comparative Study of Real-time Ultrasound-CT Fusion Imaging and Ultrasound-guided Selective Lumbar Nerve Root Block

brief_summary.textblock: The study is aimed at patients with low back and leg pain. The experimental group of patients underwent selective lumbar nerve root block puncture under real-time ultrasound-CT fusion imaging by sonographers, and the control group underwent puncture under the guidance of ultrasound alone by sonographers.

detailed_description.textblock: A total of 60 patients with low back and leg pain were randomly divided into two groups, 30 people in each group. Patients in the experimental group underwent selective lumbar nerve root block puncture under the real-time ultrasound-CT fusion imaging of the sonographer, and the control group underwent puncture under the sole ultrasound guidance of the sonographer. This study was used to compare the difference between the effects of pure ultrasound guidance and ultrasound-CT fusion imaging guidance on selective lumbar nerve root block.

primary_outcome.time_frame: VAS pain scores were performed 1 month after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Patients undergo VAS pain score after the sonographer performs selective lumbar nerve root block puncture

primary_outcome.time_frame: VAS pain scores were performed 3 month after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Patients undergo VAS pain score after the sonographer performs selective

primary_outcome.time_frame: VAS pain scores were performed 6 month after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Patients undergo VAS pain score after the sonographer performs selective

primary_outcome.time_frame: VAS pain scores were performed 12 month after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Patients undergo VAS pain score after the sonographer performs selective

arm_group.description: The experimental group of patients underwent selective lumbar nerve root block puncture under real-time ultrasound-CT fusion imaging by sonographers
The control group underwent puncture under the guidance of ultrasound alone by sonographers

intervention.description: selective lumbar nerve root block puncture under real-time ultrasound-CT fusion imaging
selective lumbar nerve root block puncture under the guidance of ultrasound alone

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Patients who need lumbar nerve root block treatment
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Tumor patients
2. Patients who have had lumbar spine surgery before

facility.name: Department of Ultrasound Diagnosis, Peking University Third Hospital
